effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Writhing Ringworm
description: Is it alive? Maybe. Is it fashionable? ...Maybe.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 98,606 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
